room_title: Escape room "The Fallout" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: We had a group of 27 and did The Fallout. We split into 4 teams and had a great time! Everyone raved about it the rest of the day! Highly recommended!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: The Fallout rooms were so much fun! This was an awesome thing to do on our friend's birthday. The puzzles were really well done and the details were great! Alex was a great host and kept things moving!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: We had a group of 10 do The Fallout escape room - girls vs guys - and had a blast! Josh did a great job explaining everything to us. Would definitely recommend this escape room to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: I brought a group of 11 teenage girls for a time of fun and fellowship and we had a blast competing in the Fallout rooms. Alex was awesome guiding some of us first timers through it. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: What a fun experience! “The Fallout” was a great competitive escape room and Will was a great host. Can’t wait to come back and try “The Cabin” room. I’ll also be back with my work team for a fun team builder. Thanks!
